name: Full Tilt (MegaProgramGuy)
description:
Full tilt is a puzzle game about switching the orientation of the level to unlock new paths and allow your player to go places that were previously inaccessible.

Use A and D or the left and right arrow keys to move left and right. Press X or space to flip the level. When you move left or right, you will keep going until you hit a wall, only then will you be affected by gravity.

FOR EXAMPLE: You press right and move over a pit. As long as you are moving through the air, you will not fall into the pit, instead you will just float until you hit a wall. Then, if you able to fall, you will. If not, you'll just sit there until you move again. When you flip the level, your player will still be attracted downwards, so you may be able to reach different paths by flipping.

20+ levels

Minimalist geometric art style

5+ uniquely puzzling features

All code, music, and assets were made within the 1-week time frame of the jam

Music and SFX by Miguel Gessaghi

Art and code by MegaProgramGuy
